com.htsmart.wristband.dfu

Interface DfuCallback


  • public interface DfuCallback
    The DFU progress is as follows：

    1.PROGRESS_REQUEST_ENTER_OTA
    2.PROGRESS_SEARCH_OTA_DEVICE
    3.PROGRESS_SEND_OTA_PACKET
    4.The progress of send OTA data packet form 0 to 100.
    5.PROGRESS_SUCCESS

    If an error has occurred, onError(int) method will callback.

    • Field Detail

      • ERROR_FILE

        static final int ERROR_FILE
        The dfu file error. May be the dfu file is not exist or format error. The dfu file must be endsWith '.bin' or '.hex'.
        See Also:

    • Method Detail

      • onError

        void onError(int errorCode)

      • onProgressChanged

        void onProgressChanged(int progress)
        If the progress is less than 0, represent the values below： PROGRESS_REQUEST_ENTER_OTA
        PROGRESS_SEARCH_OTA_DEVICE
        PROGRESS_SEND_OTA_PACKET
        PROGRESS_SUCCESS

        If the progress is greater than or equal to 0, represent the progress of send OTA data packet from 0 to 100.

        Parameters:
        progress - The progress of dfu.
